media.headline: McCutchen nabs Leon at the plate
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: McCutchen throws out Leon at home
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen grabs Dustin Pedroia's base hit and fires a strong throw to cut down Sandy Leon at the plate

media.headline: Freese's barehanded play
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Freese nabs Bogaerts, stands after review
media.bigblurb: David Freese makes a nice play to throw out Xander Bogaerts at first, and after the Red Sox challenge, the call stands in the 4th inning

media.headline: McCutchen's catch at the wall
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: McCutchen robs Moreland at the wall
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen tracks down Mitch Moreland's fly ball to deep right field and makes the catch to end the inning

media.headline: Sale fans Marte for first 2017 K
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Sale posts first strikeout on the Red Sox
media.bigblurb: Chris Sale sets down Starling Marte swinging, tallying his first strikeout of the season in a Red Sox jersey

media.headline: Mercer's diving catch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Mercer makes clutch diving grab
media.bigblurb: Jordy Mercer lays out for Hanley Ramirez's rocket to short, making an excellent diving catch to prevent a potential extra-base hit

media.headline: Bogaerts' backhanded scoop
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Bogaerts backhands grounder for the out
media.bigblurb: Xander Bogaerts snags David Freese's hard-hit grounder and leaps from the outfield grass to make the strong throw for the out

media.headline: Watson induces groundout
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Watson narrowly escapes bases loaded jam
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded in extra innings, Tony Watson forces Andrew Benintendi into a groundout to escape the inning unscathed

media.headline: Bradley Jr.'s sliding catch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Bradley Jr makes risky sliding catch
media.bigblurb: Jackie Bradley Jr. runs down Gregory Polanco's fly ball to short center field and makes a sweet sliding catch, narrowly avoiding a collision

media.headline: Bradley Jr. swipes second
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Bradley Jr. steals into scoring position
media.bigblurb: Jackie Bradley Jr. boldly hustles to second base and appears shaken up, but remains in the game

media.headline: Leon's walk-off three-run shot
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Leon blasts walk-off over the Green Monster
media.bigblurb: Sandy Leon hits a huge three-run walk-off blast over the Green Monster to defeat the Pirates in 12 innings

media.headline: Taillon gets the out at first
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Taillon cleans up near-error for the out
media.bigblurb: Jameson Taillon fumbles Pablo Sandoval's grounder before finally controlling it and getting the out at first

media.headline: Taillon gets out of the jam
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Taillon pitches himself out of the jam
media.bigblurb: With baserunners on the corners, Jameson Taillon forces Dustin Pedroia to ground out to end the inning

media.headline: Pedroia's fielder's choice
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Pedroia gets Mercer out at second base
media.bigblurb: Dustin Pedroia snags a sharp grounder off the bat of Andrew McCutchen and throws out Jordy Mercer at second for the fielder's choice

media.headline: Leon on extra-inning win
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Leon on walk-off victory vs Pirates
media.bigblurb: Red Sox hero Sandy Leon discusses what it took to grind out a win against the Pittsburgh Pirates in an epic 12-inning thriller

media.headline: Farrell on Sale's performance
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Farrell on outstanding pitching duel
media.bigblurb: Red Sox manager John Farrell discusses the incredible duel between both Chris Sale and Jameson Taillon, and the bullpen that reinforced them

media.headline: Sale fans seven in Red Sox debut
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Sale fans seven in scoreless Red Sox debut
media.bigblurb: Chris Sale strikes out seven over seven shutout innings, allowing just three hits and a walk in his debut for the Red Sox

media.headline: Taillon's scoreless start
media.blurb: PIT@BOS Taillon strikes out six over seven scoreless
media.bigblurb: Jameson Taillon pitches seven scoreless innings in Fenway, striking out seven and allowing five hits in his 2017 season debut

media.headline: Sandoval snags bunt attempt
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Sandoval catches Marte's bunt popup
media.bigblurb: Pablo Sandoval runs in and catches Starling Marte's failed bunt popup

media.headline: Statcast: Bradley's sliding grab
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Statcast analyzes Bradley's sliding catch
media.bigblurb: Statcast of the Day measures Jackie Bradley Jr.'s route and dive to make the grab with only a 49% catch probability in the 12th inning

media.headline: Recap: PIT 0, BOS 3
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Leon delivers walk-off win at Fenway
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Chris Sale and Jameson Taillon traded seven scoreless innings and Sandy Leon blasted a three-run homer in walk-off fashion

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: PIT@BOS
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: PIT@BOS
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: PIT@BOS

media.headline: Nicasio's solid 11th inning
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Nicasio fans two in scoreless inning
media.bigblurb: Juan Nicasio records two strikeouts over a scoreless bottom of the 11th inning, including his 500th career strikeout

media.headline: Barnes' scoreless inning of work
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Barnes tosses a scoreless 8th for the Sox
media.bigblurb: Matt Barnes sets the Pirates down in order in the top of the 8th inning to keep the game scoreless
